channel.title: Николай Денисов on Rusland 1

item.title: Imperative Mood (Imperative)
item.description: You need to know a few things to be able to do this in Russian. Take a look. они-form To form the imperative mood in Russian, you start with the они (they) conjugation of the verb. Remove the ending and replace it with something else.
